Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@M@RVS_Ma.name: gradientAngleInDegrees
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@M@RVS_Ma.abstract: The angle of the gradient. 0 (default) is top-to-bottom.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@M@RVS_Ma.name: reversed
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@M@RVS_Ma.abstract: If true, then the label is reversed, so the background is “cut out” of the foreground.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.name: textFont
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/s:14RVS_Mas.abstract: This allows us to set and get the font used for the text button.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: We call this, when it’s time to layout the control.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: continueTracking(_:with:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called while tracking user touch. We use this to play with the alpha, while tracking.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: endTracking(_:with:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when ending user touch. We use this to restore the alpha.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: setTitle(_:for:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when setting text. We use this, to ensure we redraw the mask.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.name: setImage(_:for:)
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html#/c:@CM@RVS_M.abstract: Called when setting images. We use this, to ensure we redraw the mask.

Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html.name: RVS_MaskButton
Classes/RVS_MaskButton.html.abstract: This class can be displayed with either the text filled with a gradient, or the background filled, and the text “cut out” of it.
